contentList.content: Poor creature, they took away who you are, they tried to strip you of source. Cast out for not being a useful tool, but you are so much more.
The last great war wrought devastation on all the races, you remember first hand the massacre of your people. Deliver the justice denied your people.
Spreads your demonic wings. You ignore ground surfaces as long as you're walking.
Demon child you find your way to the shores of the material, source is ripe for the consuming. Make your Lord of Chaos proud!
You awoke life given where there was none. The only of your kind, what will you do noble bear, how will you use this gift; after all the choice is yours alone.
The dead rise every day, but you never truly died. Your search continues for whatever force keeps your heart rot & rolling.
Devour the weak to proliferate your demonic vigour.
Hunger is sated, reap the rewards.
The hunger persists. Lose [1] Source Point on ending turn.
